Module.Content: <style> html, body { background-color: transparent; } </style> <script type="text/javascript"> var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs(); var Xurl = prefs.getString("url"); var mobile = (/iphone|ipad|ipod|android|blackberry|mini|windows\sce|palm/i.test(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase())); function Initialize() { var match = new RegExp(encodeURIComponent("noredirect=1")).test(window.location.search.substr(1)); var deviceCheck = "__UP_deviceCheck__"; if(!match) { if(mobile && deviceCheck == "Mobile or Tablet not Desktop") { parent.location = Xurl; } if (!mobile && deviceCheck == "Desktop not Mobile or Tablet") { parent.location = Xurl; } if (deviceCheck == "All") { parent.location = Xurl; } else { return false; } } } gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(Initialize); </script>
